creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Exitedit{x <direction> / new <direction> <vnum>

{Wexitedit new <direction> <vnum>{x
     Creates a new exit in the specified (direction) from the
     room you are currently in to the specified room of (vnum).

{Wexitedit <direction>{x
     This allows you to set the parimeters of the specified exit.

{WAvailable options while in exitedit:{x
     {CLocked{W:{x True or false.
     {CLock difficulty{W:{x Set the difficulty for picking this lock.
     {CKey vnum{W:{x Enter the vnum of the object that unlocks this door.
     {CMagic locked{W:{x True or false.
     {CMagic lock difficulty{W:{x Set the difficulty of dispelling the spell
                            blocking this exit.
     {CPhysical difficulty{W:{x Set the difficulty for opening the exit
                          with physical skills like doorbash.
     {CSize{W:{x vast, huge, large, medium, small, tiny and miniscule..
     {CKeywords{W:{x Words the player can type to examine the exit.
